description: specificProblem: Card went from INS to OOS state

event.Summary: EID card state changed from INS to OOS

description: specificProblem: card enter into maintenace state

event.Summary: EID card transitioned to maintenance state

description: specificProblem: Card is fully operational in Active state. This alarm cancels alarm EID_CARD_OOS or Alarm EID_CARD_SWITCHOVER

event.Summary: EID card is in active state

description: specificProblem: Card is fully operational in Standby state. This alarm cancels alarm EID_CARD_OOS or Alarm EID_CARD_SWITCHOVER

event.Summary: EID card is in standby state

description: specificProblem: All cards belong to the same protection group are OOS, group is not operational

event.Summary: Protection group OOS is not operational

description: specificProblem: Protection group is operational. One card as a minimum is active. Cancels previous alarm AID_PROTECTION_OOS

specificProblem: Switchover between Active and Standby card took place, Standby card became an Active and fully operational. Two additional alarms should be generated on the switchover EID_CARD_INS_ACTIVE and EID_CARD_INS_STDBY

event.Summary: Card switched from standby to active

description: specificProblem: all component enter into inservice state
specificProblem: system minimum component enter into active

description: specificProblem: system active side enter into inservice

description: specificProblem:SAS Array has issues. This alarm can be cleared by manual intervention only.

description: probablyCause: A thread can be hung for a number of different reasons, including a deadlock on a shared resource or an infinite loop.
specificProblem: This event is sent when PM detects a hung thread in a process. A hung thread means the thread is no longer able to process messages as normal.
repairAction: The process will be restarted automatically by PM to recover from the hung thread.
probablyCause:A always-on, fail-safe alarm that is raised whenever 95% of the maximum size of an MX-queue is exceeded.

event.Summary: Exceeded maximum queue threshold alarm raised

description: probablyCause:Cleared when queue size drops below 70% usage.

event.Summary: Exceeded maximum queue threshold alarm cleared

description: specificProblem:Locking 2 ADM components in 1 Protection Group is not allowed.
